document.full_text: sony corp said it will start restoring its playstation videogame network in japan and elsewhere in asia on saturday, more than a month after a massive security breach leaked personal details on tens of millions of accounts.
document.title: sony restoring game network in asia; to testify in u.s.
lines_and_colors: sony corp said it will start restoring its playstation videogame network in japan and elsewhere in asia on saturday, more than a month after a massive security breach leaked personal details on tens of millions of accounts.
